data.title: Will Tommy McBain now go by his birth name Todd Manning jr
data.meta_description: ?) Do you think that Todd and Blair will allow Tommy to keep his adoptive name or will he have his birth name. Will they ever tell Tommy/Todd jr ahout his psycho birth mother Margaret? Will Todd allow Micheal to be in To…
data.text:
I’m not sure that Tommy’s birth name is Todd Manning Jr. I think that’s just what Spencer called him. If it were is birth name - I don’t think it would have taken this long for Todd to find him. (I could be wrong)

Will they ever tell him about his mother? This is a soap! It will come out in about 10 years when he is in high school and people tease him, just like they did with Star this year. Margaret also had a sister, I’m guessing that she’ll make an appearance and demand sometype of visitation rights. I’m sure that Margaret also has parents that will want visitation (hmmm…maybe a casting call will be announced shortly)

Will Todd let Michael and Marcy be part of Tommy’s life? We’re talking about Todd here. I wouldn’t hold my breath on that one.

Spencer never would have adopted him out as Todd Manning Jr. That was the name Margaret gave him but it wasn’t placed on a birth certificate because there wasn’t one. As Todd stated, he doesn’t know a child named Tommy so I doubt that the kid would keep that name.

If I were Todd, it would be a cold day in an ice covered Hades before I let either Marcie or Michael near my child!
